metadata.title: CVE-2022-1157 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Missing sanitization of logged exception messages in all versions prior to14.7.7, 14.8 prior to 14.8.5, and 14.9 prior to 14.9.2 of GitLab CE/EEcauses potential sensitive values in invalid URLs to be logged

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
